p: Although the majority of the threatened and near threatened species (Tiainen et al., 2016) have declined, many red‐listed species, such as white‐tailed eagle, golden eagle Aquila chrysaetos, peregrine Falco peregrinus, and white‐backed woodpecker Dendrocopos leucotos have increased their ranges between 1974–1989 and 2006–2010 (Table S1).
